    • modifyComponent

      public static <T> void modifyComponent(Object[] objects, Changer.ChangeMode mode, @NotNull DataComponentType.Valued<T> type, @Nullable T value)
      Quick method to modify DataComponents of items
      Type Parameters:
      T - DataComponentType value
      Parameters:
      objects - Item based objects to modify (Accepts can be ItemStack, ItemType or Slot)
      mode - ChangeMode passed from expression
      type - DataComponentType to modify
      value - Value to set

    • setItemName

      public static void setItemName(ItemStack itemStack, @Nullable @Nullable Component name, boolean itemName)
      Set the ItemName/CustomName of an ItemStack

      Null name value will reset to vanilla value

      Parameters:
      itemStack - ItemStack to modify name
      name - Name to modify
      itemName - Whether item or custom name
